comment: Dr. Allen was a decent professor. Some of her assignments were tricky and confusing, but it's an easy class overall. She does tend to ramble about her personal life instead of actually teaching. Her tests are lockdown browser with webcam, and she throws a few trick questions in there too. If you just study and come to class you'll be fine!
Overall, I'd recommend taking a different professor. She didn't care for her students and had many tricky questions on both assignments and tests.

DO NOT TAKE HER! She does not treat her students with respect and a lot of her assignments are based on her opinions (not factual). She gives assignments that encourage stereotyping people and evaluating a person worth by degrading standards. If your opinion is not her opinion, your grade will suffer.

She talked about her family so much that we never learned anything. We were on the same PowerPoint for the first 4 months of the semester. I worked really hard and still got a c. Will never take her class again.  Grading was very hard and she never explained assignments.

I wouldn't recommend taking this class if you actually want to learn about sociology. She always got off track & would just talk about her son, husband, or sister Pretty easy A class not heavy workload but be prepared to have to figure it out on your own. Attendance isn't mandatory but she does do class participation assignments on random days.

do not know why she has so many bad reviews. she is so funny and genuinely cares about her students. class is very easy and straightforward. you have a whole week to do the assignments and there is not much to them, you can complete most in 30-40 min. no lockdown browsers. take her if you can!

Professor Judy Isn't bad. Read the syllabus to it's entirety and you will be just fine. She often sends "HEADS UP" emails to remind you of what you should be turning in each week. Professor Judy is also very understanding when it comes to what goes on within your personal life that could interfere with turning in assignments. I would recommend.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Test heavy--Clear grading criteria

comment: This woman. I swear. She is not organized at all. She doesnt use her KSU email address (which is against school policy). I liked her as a person. Shes nice. But as a student I was very frustrated with her. Youll probably make an A if you show up and participate. I do not recommend it for any Type A personality people.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: PLZ TAKE HER!!! She is an amazing professor and I learned a lot from her class! My class was very involved, so if you don't try, it could be a little difficult to enjoy the class. She is will be there for you if you have any questions or advice. I changed my major to soci b/c of the class. I still keep in contact with her b/c she genuinely cares!

I am a straight A student &I missed one small assignment which caused me to not be able to exempt the final. difficult to reach by email when needed. just all around very difficult to work with, emails are not always coherent and directions given for assignments don't always make sense. would not recommend, take a different professor if you can.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things

comment: She writes ALL emails in caps. She is rude and not helpful at all. I read other reviews that said she was a great teacher, that was determined as a lie. The assignments do not have clear directions. I'm an A student and I have never had the problems I've had with her. I actually changed classes next semester so I do not have to have her again!

Professor Allen is never and I mean NEVER clear when it comes to instructions, she has to correct herself on almost ever module. Your grade will suffer, if your not careful, because of her lack of instruction. Her test are tricky, you may be completely prepared but she throws trick questions in there that are very difficult. I wouldn't take her.

Skip class alot &you fail. Textbook is needed. If u do well all semester, ur rewarded by exempting the final if u have a 95 on exemption day. Lecture style is laid-back and engaging. She makes herself readily available for students. She will work with u if ur willing to work hard. Shes also a no-nonsense prof. So dont slack and expect her mercy.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Inspirational--Accessible outside class

comment: she expects you to work hard and never give up

The professor doesn't reply back to your emails or phone calls so you'll never know what you made in the class till its posted online especially for the students who are border line will definitely drop to a B without know how even though the final is as easy as first test. I will not recommend her to anyone.
She is the best!  Must take this professor!  You are missing out if you don't take her.  The class with stay with you for a life time I learned so much from her.

The lectures are long and dry, unless of course she goes of topic like usual and talks about her personal life. Learning time: 30min, family life: 45min. Take notes that work for you? well to bad they aren't good enough if they don't meet her standards. She grades tough with absolutely no guidelines,  refuses to be wrong even with otherwise proof.
Great professor, really has a kind heart
